title: The government of the thoughts a prefatory discourse to The government of the tongue / by the author of The whole duty of man.
author: Allestree, Richard, 1619-1681.
publisher: Printed by R. Smith for Richard Cumberland ...,
notes: Advertisement: p. 179 and p. [3] at end.

The whole duty of man attributed by Wing and others to Richard Allestree. This text variously attributed to Lady Dorothy Pakington, Richard Sterne, Abp. of York, John Fell, Bp. of Oxford, and others. cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
